column4: could someone please tell me how to reinstall ubuntu and make sure grub is installed?
boot from pretty much any medium and do a "grub-install"
how exactly do i do that? do i put that in the command line when it says "Error: file not found" "grub>"
check the interwebs. googling for "grub-install" revealed http://www.gnu.org/software/grub/manual/html_node/Installing-GRUB-using-grub_002dinstall.html
